homeTwoHero.title: Hi, I am Jhon Doe
homeTwoHero.text:
I am a frontend web developer. I can provide clean code and pixel perfect design.
I also make website more & more interactive with web animations.

aboutData.title: Hi There! I'm Islamiyat Oniyo
aboutData.subtitle: Frontend Developer
aboutData.text: I am a Frontend Developer with a strong focus on building visually engaging and user-friendly digital experiences. Frontend development blends design and technology to attract, inspire, and guide users, transforming ideas into interactive interfaces that create meaningful and impactful user experiences. With a keen eye for detail and a passion for creativity, I specialize in crafting responsive websites and applications that not only look great but also function seamlessly across various devices and platforms. My expertise lies in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular frontend frameworks like React.js. I am dedicated to staying updated with the latest industry trends and best practices to ensure that my work remains innovative and effective.

services.title: Frontend Web Development
services.text: I build fast, responsive, and interactive websites using modern frontend technologies to deliver smooth user experiences across all devices.

services.title: UI Implementation
services.text: I transform design concepts into clean, functional interfaces, ensuring pixel-perfect layouts and consistent user interactions.

services.title: Responsive Design
services.text: I create layouts that adapt seamlessly to different screen sizes, providing an optimal experience on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.

services.title: Website Optimization
services.text: I optimize websites for speed, accessibility, and performance, ensuring smooth navigation, faster load times, and an improved overall user experience.

services.title: Design-to-Code Conversion
services.text: I convert Figma design files into clean, responsive, and maintainable code, ensuring accurate layouts, consistent styling, and seamless user interactions.

services.title: Website Maintenance & Updates
services.text: I maintain and update websites by fixing issues, improving functionality, and keeping content current to ensure long-term reliability and performance.

skillData.title: Professional Skills
skillData.text: Below are the core skills I apply in my frontend development work. I focus on building responsive, user-focused interfaces using clean, maintainable code and modern web technologies.

skills.title: React.js – component-based architecture and state management
CSS3 & UI Styling – layouts, animations, and visual consistency
Git & GitHub – version control and collaborative workflows
Responsive Web Design – mobile-first, cross-device compatibility
Figma Design to Code – accurate UI implementation from designs

contactData.title: Contact Info
contactData.subTitle: Connect with me through social media or send a message directly
contactData.text: I’m always open to discussing new projects, collaborations, or opportunities. Feel free to reach out via social channels or the contact form, and I’ll get back to you promptly.
